CVE-2021-20336.title: IBM Tivoli Netcool/OMNIbus_GUI cross-site scripting
CVE-2021-20336.body: IBM Tivoli Netcool/OMNIbus_GUI 8.1.0 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2021-20354.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server information disclosure
CVE-2021-20354.body: IBM WebSphere Application Server 8.0, 8.5, and 9.0 could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to view arbitrary files on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 194883.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2021-20494.title: IBM Security Identity Manager Adapters denial of service
CVE-2021-20494.body: IBM Security Identity Manager Adapters 6.0 and 7.0 are vulnerable to a heap based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds. See References.

CVE-2021-20515.title: IBM Informix Dynamic Server buffer overflow
CVE-2021-20515.body: IBM Informix Dynamic Server 14.10 is vulnerable to a stack based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking. A local privileged user could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause a denial of service condition. IBM X-Force ID: 198366.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 6448568 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2021-20517.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server Network Deployment directory traversal

An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to read and delete arbitrary files on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 198435.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2021-20564.title: IBM Cloud Pak for Security information disclosure
CVE-2021-20564.body: IBM Cloud Pak for Security (CP4S) 1.4.0.0, 1.5.0.0, 1.5.0.1, 1.6.0.0, and 1.6.0.1 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to properly enable HTTP Strict Transport Security. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information using man in the middle techniques. IBM X-Force ID: 199235.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 6453115 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2021-20565.title: IBM Cloud Pak for Security (CP4S) improper input validation
CVE-2021-20565.body: IBM Cloud Pak for Security (CP4S) 1.4.0.0, 1.5.0.0, 1.5.0.1, 1.6.0.0, and 1.6.0.1 uses a protection mechanism that relies on the existence or values of an input, but the input can be modified by an untrusted actor in a way that bypasses the protection mechanism. IBM X-Force ID: 199236.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 6453115 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2021-20572.title: IBM Security Identity Manager Adapters buffer overflow
CVE-2021-20572.body: IBM Security Identity Manager Adapters 6.0 and 7.0 are vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking. A remote authenticated attacker could overflow the and cause the server to crash. IBM X-Force ID: 199247.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 6465875 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2021-20573.title: IBM Security Identity Manager Adapters buffer overflow
CVE-2021-20573.body: IBM Security Identity Manager Adapters 6.0 and 7.0 are vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking. CVE-2021-20579.title: IBM Db2 information disclosure
CVE-2021-20579.body: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 could allow a user who can create a view or inline SQL function to obtain sensitive information when AUTO_REVAL is set to DEFFERED_FORCE. IBM X-Force ID: 199283.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 6466369 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2021-20580.title: IBM Planning Analytics cross-site request forgery
CVE-2021-20580.body: IBM Planning Analytics 2.0 could be vulnerable to cross-site request forgery (CSRF) which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 198241.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 6462331 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2021-20583.title: IBM Security Verify Privilege Vault information disclosure
CVE-2021-20583.body: IBM Security Verify (IBM Security Verify Privilege Vault 10.9.66) could disclose sensitive information through an HTTP GET request by a privileged user due to improper input validation.. IBM X-Force ID: 199396.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 6467045 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2021-20585.title: IBM Security Verify Access information disclosure
CVE-2021-20585.body: IBM Security Verify Access 20.07 could disclose sensitive information in HTTP server headers that could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 199398.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 6457315 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2021-29666.title: IBM Spectrum Scale cross-site scripting
CVE-2021-29666.body: IBM Spectrum Scale 5.0.0 through 5.0.5.6 and 5.1.0 through 5.1.0.2 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 199400.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. CVE-2021-29670.title: IBM Jazz Foundation and IBM Engineering products cross-site scripting
CVE-2021-29670.body: IBM Jazz Foundation and IBM Engineering products are vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 199408.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 6457739 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2021-29672.title: IBM Spectrum Protect Client buffer overflow
CVE-2021-29672.body: IBM Spectrum Protect Client 8.1.0.0-8 through 1.11.0 is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when processing the current locale settings. A local attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash. IBM X-Force ID: 199479Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2021-29677.title: IBM Security Verify Privilege Vault cross-site scripting
CVE-2021-29677.body: IBM Security Verify (IBM Security Verify Privilege Vault 10.9.66) is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 6467045 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2021-29693.title: IBM AIX denial of service
CVE-2021-29693.body: IBM AIX 7.1, 7.2, and VIOS 3.1 could allow a local user that is in the with elevated group privileges to cause a denial of service due to a vulnerability in the lpd daemon. IBM X-Force ID: 200255.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 6467129 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2021-29695.title: IBM Host firmware for LC-class Systems information disclosure
CVE-2021-29695.body: IBM Host firmware for LC-class Systems could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request that would allow them to delete arbitrary files on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 200558.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2021-29708.title: IBM Spectrum Scale information disclosure
CVE-2021-29708.body: IBM Spectrum Scale 5.1.0.1 could allow a local with access to the GUI pod container to obtain sensitive cryptographic keys that could allow them to elevate their privileges. IBM X-Force ID: 200883.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 6455629 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2021-29712.title: IBM InfoSphere Information Server cross-site scripting
CVE-2021-29712.body: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 200966.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 6468581 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2021-29730.title: IBM InfoSphere Information Server SQL injection
CVE-2021-29730.body: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database. IBM X-Force ID: 201164.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.
